column4: quick question - it's been a long time - does undernet register nicks?
haha, i just realized.
sorry.
running gnome in 9.1 i'm using xchat with the uber script - better alternatives?
i saw irssi - customizable but still console.  i like the mirc feel of xchat.  hard to find scripts for it though.
there are a ton of scrips for irssi..
themes too..
i have libpod4 and libpod installed via synaptic - did it take much else in terms of dependencies?
you need those and much more.  have a look at the article..  its quite easy to follow..
so you added the repository  and did sudo apt-get update?
they may have changed the repository...  ill check, one sec.
i have libmobiledevice0 installed...
ohh ok. were there any that didn't install?
making some progress - will update you in a few.
ok, let me know how it goes..
i'm rebooting now, will let you know how it goes.
holy hell - nice job man!
hey glad it worked for ya!!
spread the word...
stayed up all night updating my ipod finally. ; )
right on man.
yeah im sure you noticed, it takes a little longer to sync...

I originally just had the libpod packages installed.  when I went through and finally got libimobile and ran the config with fuse (had to find and install ifuse), I'm just happy to have it recognize - now I can start patching on functionality.
